mapper.select: SELECT NO ,P_LEVEL ,NAME ,VACATION FROM POSITION
SELECT TEAM_NO ,TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM

SELECT m.TEAM_NO ,m.POSITION_NO ,m.NAME ,m.NO ,p.NAME AS POSITION_NAME ,t.TEAM_NAME FROM MEMBER m JOIN TEAM t ON m.TEAM_NO = t.TEAM_NO JOIN POSITION p ON m.POSITION_NO = p.NO
WHERE m.TEAM_NO = #{teamNo} AND m.POSITION_NO = #{positionNo}
SELECT M.NAME ,M.APPROVAL_POWER ,M.NO ,P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME ,T.TEAM_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN TEAM T ON M.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO
SELECT DOCUMENT_TYPE_NO ,DOCUMENT_TYPE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE WHERE DOCUMENT_TYPE_NO = 1
SELECT DOCUMENT_TYPE_NO ,DOCUMENT_TYPE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE WHERE DOCUMENT_TYPE_NO = 2
SELECT DOCUMENT_TYPE_NO ,DOCUMENT_TYPE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE WHERE DOCUMENT_TYPE_NO = 3
SELECT * FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT WHERE USER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY NO DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
SELECT * FROM ITEM_MANAGER
SELECT * FROM PURCHASE_REQUISITION WHERE APP_NO = #{avoNo} ORDER BY NO DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY

SELECT A.NO ,A.TYPE_NO ,A.USER_NO ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.AD_YN ,A.ENROLL_DATE ,A.END_DATE ,T.DOCUMENT_TYPE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT A JOIN APPROVAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE T ON A.TYPE_NO = T.DOCUMENT_TYPE_NO WHERE A.TITLE IS NOT NULL AND USER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT WHERE TITLE IS NOT NULL AND USER_NO = #{no}

SELECT A.NO ,A.TYPE_NO ,A.USER_NO ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.AD_YN ,A.ENROLL_DATE ,V.PRIORITY ,S.NAME AS STATUS_NAME ,T.DOCUMENT_TYPE_NAME ,P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME ,TM.TEAM_NAME ,M.NAME AS SEND_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT A JOIN APPROVER V ON A.NO = V.APPROVAL_DOC_NO JOIN APPROVAL_STATUS S ON V.STATUS_NO = S.NO JOIN APPROVAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE T ON A.TYPE_NO = T.DOCUMENT_TYPE_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON A.USER_NO = M.NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POSITION_NO JOIN TEAM TM ON TM.TEAM_NO = M.TEAM_NO WHERE V.APP_NO = #{no} ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT A.NO ,A.TYPE_NO ,A.USER_NO ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.AD_YN ,A.ENROLL_DATE ,A.END_DATE ,T.DOCUMENT_TYPE_NAME ,M.NAME AS SEND_NAME ,P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME ,TM.TEAM_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT A JOIN APPROVAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE T ON A.TYPE_NO = T.DOCUMENT_TYPE_NO JOIN APPROVAL_REFERRER R ON A.NO = R.APPROVAL_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON A.USER_NO = M.NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POSITION_NO JOIN TEAM TM ON TM.TEAM_NO = M.TEAM_NO WHERE A.TITLE IS NOT NULL AND REFERRER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT A.NO ,A.TYPE_NO ,A.USER_NO ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.AD_YN ,A.ENROLL_DATE ,A.END_DATE ,V.VACATION_START ,V.VACATION_END ,M.NAME AS WRITER_NAME ,P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME ,TM.TEAM_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.USER_NO = M.NO JOIN VACATION_APPLY V ON A.NO = V.APP_NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POSITION_NO JOIN TEAM TM ON TM.TEAM_NO = M.TEAM_NO WHERE A.TYPE_NO = 1 AND A.NO = #{no}

SELECT A.NO ,A.APPROVAL_DOC_NO ,A.STATUS_NO ,A.APP_NO ,A.PRIORITY ,M.NAME AS APPROVER_NAME ,ST.NAME AS STATUS_NAME FROM APPROVER A JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = A.APP_NO JOIN APPROVAL_STATUS ST ON A.STATUS_NO = ST.NO WHERE APPROVAL_DOC_NO = #{no}
SELECT AR.NO ,AR.APPROVAL_NO ,AR.REFERRER_NO ,M.NAME AS REFERRER_NAME FROM APPROVAL_REFERRER AR JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = AR.REFERRER_NO WHERE APPROVAL_NO = #{no}

SELECT A.NO ,A.TYPE_NO ,A.USER_NO ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.AD_YN ,A.ENROLL_DATE ,A.END_DATE ,M.NAME AS WRITER_NAME ,P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME ,TM.TEAM_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.USER_NO = M.NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POSITION_NO JOIN TEAM TM ON TM.TEAM_NO = M.TEAM_NO WHERE A.TYPE_NO = 2 AND A.NO = #{no}

SELECT P.NO ,P.APP_NO ,P.PRICE AS TOTAL_PRICE ,ITEM.COUNT ,MA.NAME ,MA.PRICE FROM PURCHASE_REQUISITION P JOIN PURCHASE_ITEMLIST ITEM ON P.NO = ITEM.PURCHASE_REQUISITION_NO JOIN ITEM_MANAGER MA ON ITEM.ITEM_NO = MA.ITEM_NO WHERE P.APP_NO = #{no}
